description._content: Description: Men wearing tallitot dancing with Torah scrolls in front of the Jerusalem city walls and David's Tower and flighter planes in the backdrop. The central Torah opens. On back: Hebrew texts and designs in blue depicting six-pointed stars (Magen David) and open and dressed Torahs. Inscription in Hebrew: "Jerusalem of Gold" on the bottom. Along top, "Celebrate and rejoice in celebration of the Torah (Simchat Torah)" Date: circa 1967 Medium: Paper, printed Repository: Yeshiva University Museum Call Number: 2005.004 Persistent URL: access.cjh.org/594012 Rights Information: No known copyright restrictions; may be subject to third party rights. For more copyright information, click here. See more information about this image and others at CJH Digital Collections.
